job description:
Job Description
Immediate need for a Data Analyst with experience in the Telecom Industry. This is a 6 months contract opportunity with long-term potential located in Ashburn, VA. Please review the job description below:

Job ID: 17-12394

Key Responsibilities/ Key Requirements and Technology Experience:
  • 1 report daily
  • I docs reprocessing as needed
  • Invoicing 3 times weekly (M,W,F)
  • Weekly reporting:
    •
  • 5 reports weekly
  • Monthly reporting:
    •
  • Approximately 17 reports monthly.
  • SAP via SQ01 / SE16; standard reporting dumped to excel and combined with other data.
  • Training would be provided over a 1 month period to cover all reporting needs. Training on password resets and common help desk issues will be provided up front. Other training as requests are received. (Estimation of approximately 5 calls a day).
  • Knowledge of the following SAP functions is highly desired:
  • SD (Sales and Distribution)
  • MM (Material Management)
  • PP (Production Planning)
  • ABAP Query.
  • Microsoft Excel skills and Client shipping manifest system knowledge are desired as well.
Our client is a leading Telecom Industry and we are currently interviewing to fill this and other similar contract positions. Qualified candidates should apply online for immediate consideration.
